name: slack-ui
description: A light UI theme for Atom that is inspired by Slack's aubergine sidebar theme
readme: # Slack UI A light UI theme for Atom that is inspired by Slack's aubergine theme. ![screen shot 2015-10-16 at 3 27 27 am](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6729106/10536027/e2dd1b32-73b5-11e5-90c6-0a391080773f.png) ![ss-timecop](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6729106/10560778/2c087a12-74e3-11e5-9581-7849cb53ce66.png) ## Installation Fire up a console and type: `$ apm install slack-ui` Or, inside Atom's settings select Install and then search for this package. ## Configuration Use with Atom's 'Atom Light' Syntax theme.
